Package Reservation_package

Class Customer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Reservation_package.Customer
  • public class Customer
extends java.lang.Object
    Customer class that contains Customer information such as name, id, pax, and membership.

                int pax,
                java.lang.Boolean membership)
        Customer object constructor
        Parameters:
        name - name of this Customer
        pax - int number of people this reservation is for
        membership - boolean whether the Customer is a member or not

        public double getOrderPrice()
        Gets the price of this customer's Order, including tax and membership discount (if applicable)
        Returns:
        double total amount payable by this Customer

      • getOrderDiscount

        public double getOrderDiscount()
        Gets amount of money saved by this Customer due to membership discount (if applicable)
        Returns:
        double amount of money saved due to discounts if member, else 0

        Returns:

        public boolean isMember()
        Gets membership status of this Customer
        Returns:

      • print_customer

      • print_invoice

        public int print_invoice()
        Displays this customer's invoice and returns a success value
        Returns:
        int 1 if invoice successfully printed, and int -1 if there is no Order created and thus no invoice
